title: Kara Yazı
overview: Kara Yazı (Black Writing/Black Text) is about a unloving father grew up being exposed to physical violence, one would say his own cosmetics company to enlarge his father's appreciation of those who earnMehmet Karahan with his father's honor obsession because femininity is suppressed, the two girls who adhere to his brother and make the chemistry teacher only dream that Yaren Uluçınar is' s story Black Text.
